issue.title: Add WMTS support
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

Add the WMTS support for the map

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

For info Thomas :  GeoExt 1.1 now support printing of WMTS layer (in REST, not KVP) -> http://trac.geoext.org/wiki/Release/1.1/Notes
